mapper.select: SELECT count(id) AS visitDayCount, t.mac, t.end_time as time FROM visit_probe t WHERE DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') =#{time} AND assets_id =#{assetsId} GROUP BY t.mac
SELECT date(t.end_time) AS visitDate, count(id) AS visitCount FROM visit_probe t WHERE (t.end_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT date(t.end_time) AS visitDate, count(id) AS visitCount FROM visit_probe t WHERE ( ABS(t.db) BETWEEN #{sdb} AND #{edb} ) AND (t.end_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT COALESCE(sum(dep.dayTime),0) from ( SELECT ROUND( UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.end_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t.begin_time) ) as dayTime FROM visit_probe t WHERE (t.end_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) GROUP BY t.mac ) dep
SELECT count(id) AS visitDayCount, t.mac, t.end_time as time FROM visit_probe t WHERE (t.end_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) GROUP BY t.end_time,t.mac

SELECT t1. NAME, avCount FROM ( SELECT COUNT(id) AS avcount, assets_id FROM visit_probe t WHERE (t.end_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) GROUP BY t.assets_id ) a LEFT JOIN assets t1 ON a.assets_id = t1.id ORDER BY a.avcount DESC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT t1. NAME, avCount FROM ( SELECT COUNT(id) AS avcount, assets_id FROM visit_probe t WHERE (t.end_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) AND ( ABS(t.db) BETWEEN #{sdb} AND #{edb} ) GROUP BY t.assets_id ) a LEFT JOIN assets t1 ON a.assets_id = t1.id ORDER BY a.avcount DESC LIMIT 0, 10
SELECT count(1) from visit_probe t where t.is_old=1 and (t.end_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end})
